response.original_title: Zapatero a tus Zapatos aunque Pases Malos Ratos
response.overview: Arthur, a young father to whom life has disadvantaged, has to devote to collect waste for recycling at the landfill, along with his wife and three young daughters. The twist of fate gives you the opportunity to develop their talents, when someone (desperate for the little use of their business) takes in the dump material for footwear. Arthur collects these materials, with great dedication and raw talent, manages to make his first pair of shoes, which sell easily and start earning enough to support his family. Over time discover the wonder of feeling fulfilled and satisfied with their creations, but not before passing by disagreements with his family and be disappointed.
response.title: Zapatero a tus Zapatos aunque Pases Malos Ratos
